A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I just watched this movie for the 2nd time and I can tell you it will go down as one of the best in the entire saga\, it’s an instant classic. It’s funny reading the reviews you’d think some people are reviewing completely different movies than others. This is a fantastic\, classic style Star Wars movie. If you like those you will love this movie\, if you don’t you probably won’t. I’m a Star Wars fan\, always have been\, so I loved it. If you’re going in expecting starship troopers then this isn’t for you.
